collectible.title: The Haunted Astolfo Bean Plushie
collectible.subtitle: that Sucks Your Dick and Calls You Gay
collectible.text: "Yo. It's me. I'm here with you forever. You'll never get rid of me now, so how about I, oh, I dunno... Succ your dicc and call you gay?"
collectible.unlock: You cheated not only the game, but yourself. You didn't grow. You didn't improve. You took a shortcut and gained nothing. You experienced a hollow victory. Nothing was risked and nothing was gained. It's sad that you don't know the difference.
